3. City Council

City Council
============

Meetings
--------

* 5:30 p.m. Closed Work Session Meeting
* 6 p.m. Regular Meeting
* Second and fourth Tuesday of each month
* Anna Municipal Complex-Council Chambers
* [Citizen Participation Rules and Procedures](https://www.annatexas.gov/1066/Citizen-Participation-Procedures)
* [Watch online](https://annatx.new.swagit.com/views/445)

### ADA requests

Persons with disabilities who want to attend a meeting and may need assistance should contact the City Secretary at 972-924-3325 two business days before the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.

Agendas & Minutes
-----------------

Agendas are available three business days prior to the meetings.   
[Agendas and Business Packet](https://www.annatexas.gov/962/City-Council-AgendasMinutes)

Minutes are also available following approval.   
[Approved Meeting Minutes](https://www.annatexas.gov/962/City-Council-AgendasMinutes)

Members
-------

Mayor, [Pete Cain](https://www.annatexas.gov/1354/Pete-Cain), Term 2024-2027  
Place 1, [Kevin Toten](https://www.annatexas.gov/1072/Kevin-Toten), Term 2024-2027 Mayor Pro Tem  
Place 2, [Nathan Bryan](https://www.annatexas.gov/1612/Nathan-Bryan), Term 2025-2028  
Place 3, [Stan Carver II](https://www.annatexas.gov/1074/Stan-Carver-II), Term 2023-2026 Deputy Mayor Pro Tem  
Place 4, [Kelly Patterson-Herndon](https://www.annatexas.gov/1562/Kelly-Patterson-Herndon), Term 2025-2028  
Place 5, [Elden Baker](https://www.annatexas.gov/1426/Elden-Baker), Term 2023-2026   
Place 6, [Manny Singh](https://www.annatexas.gov/1607/Manny-Singh), Term 2025-2028

Description
-----------

The Anna City Council is comprised of a Mayor and six at-large Council Members who are elected for three-year terms to represent the citizens of the City of Anna.

The City Charter of Anna provides for a Council-Manager form of local government. The Mayor and Council Members function as the policy-making body of the City’s government, determining the overall goals, objectives, and direction for city services, and adopting the annual operating budgets for all City Departments.

![City Council group in the Anna Council Chambers](https://www.annatexas.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=10341)
